content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today?
Yeah hi, I need someone to look at my breaker panel, some outlets aren't working in my kitchen.
I understand how frustrating electrical issues can be! Could I have your name to get started with scheduling an appointment?
Why do you need my name? I just want someone to fix this asap.
I ask for your name so our technician can identify you when they arrive and to make sure your appointment is set up correctly. Would you be able to provide your name for the booking?
Can I just book it without all that? I don't really want to give personal info over text.

I understand your concern about privacy. Unfortunately, having your name is required to secure the appointment and for our technician to confirm with you at the time of service. Is there a preferred way youâ€™d like to share your information, or would you like to speak with a human representative?
I'd rather talk to a real person. Can you transfer me?
reason: Customer refused to provide name and requested a human operator.
